text: The 2005 Monterey Sports Car Championships was the final race for the 2005 American Le Mans Series season held at Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca. It took place on October 16, 2005. This race saw the competition debut of the new Porsche RS Spyder, the first Porsche prototype in approximately seven years. ==Official results== Class winners in bold.
